parameters.name: CallbackConfig
parameters.description: The callback URL. The value is a JSON array. If a callback event is triggered, ApsaraVideo Live sends an HTTP POST request to the URL. The content is included in the HTTP request body.

parameters.name: DomainName
parameters.description:
The main streaming domain.

>  Only domain names that reside in the China (Shanghai) and China (Beijing) regions are supported.

parameters.name: InputStreamList
parameters.description:
The input streams. The value is a JSON array.

For more information, see **InputStreamConfig**.

parameters.name: LayoutId
parameters.description:
The ID of the layout. Valid values:

*   **MixStreamLayout-1-1**
*   **MixStreamLayout-2-1**
*   **MixStreamLayout-2-2**
*   **MixStreamLayout-2-3**
*   **MixStreamLayout-3-1**
*   **MixStreamLayout-3-2**
*   **MixStreamLayout-4-1**
*   **USERDEFINED**: If you do not use the preceding preset layouts, set the value to **USERDEFINED**.

parameters.name: OutputConfig
parameters.description:
The configuration of the output stream. The value is a JSON string.

For more information, see **OutputConfig**.
